summary: This mod adds All the different types of glass weapons, arrows, and ingots to the game. There are ten different color sets to match your personality
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds All the different types of glass weapons, arrows, and ingots to the game. There are ten different color sets to match your personality
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Colors:
<br /><br />red,
<br /><br />yellow,
<br /><br />yellow green,
<br /><br />green,
<br /><br />green cyan,
<br /><br />cyan,
<br /><br />blue,
<br /><br />violet,
<br /><br />purple,
<br /><br />and pink
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
author: Askmen Andrea
